section.name: Download Maven Plugin
section.p: The fastest way to get started with AndroMDA is to download the maven plugin and start using in your project right away. The plugin contains everything that AndroMDA needs to run and supports all of its available cartridges.

To download and install the plugin into your maven plugin repository, type:
maven plugin:download -DgroupId=andromda -DartifactId=maven-andromda-plugin -Dversion=3.0-SNAPSHOT
